comments:

workbench/.metadata folder registers an exception dump:

What version of the Visual Editor are you using? Also if the OS listed here is 
correct (windows 98)... I don't think Eclipse supports this platform OS so the 
VE won't work correctly either.
No response... please re-open and provide more information if still a problem
